summary: This document is an email chain from August 13, 2019, between FBI personnel discussing a TECS search for flight information and a request for background information on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend. The emails coordinate an upcoming interview and address questions from a Deputy Director.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent FBI/NYPD
persons.context: Appears in the email chain coordinating the interview of Epstein's girlfriend and providing background information to address questions from a Deputy Director.

persons.name: Special Agent in Charge Criminal Division FBI New York Office
persons.context: Requests information on Epstein's girlfriend to address questions from a Deputy Director.

persons.name: Assistant Director in Charge FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Copied on the email chain, indicating oversight of the investigation.

events.title: Flight Delta 676 from St Thomas to JFK
events.description: TECS search conducted for an inbound flight from St Thomas to JFK on June 5, 2019, with passport information noted.

events.title: Outbound flight to Paris
events.description: Confirmed outbound flight to Paris on June 12, 2019, where a subject was not on board.

events.title: Outbound flight with no designated location
events.description: Noted outbound flight on June 14, 2019, with no location designated.

events.title: Email coordination on Epstein's girlfriend
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to gather background information on Epstein's girlfriend and schedule an interview.
personsInvolved: Special Agent in Charge Criminal Division FBI New York Office

keyFacts: The FBI conducted a TECS search for flight information related to Jeffrey Epstein's associates, including inbound and outbound flights in June 2019.
A Deputy Director requested a short summary on Epstein's girlfriend, including her background and a timeline for a future interview.
Epstein's girlfriend was not known to 'C19' prior to Epstein's death, and an interview with her was tentatively scheduled for a Friday.
The email chain shows coordination between multiple FBI personnel, including a Supervisory Special Agent, Special Agent in Charge, and Assistant Director in Charge.
The girlfriend was known to use Epstein's addresses when registering for different things.
